      • subfiles

        @RequestMapping(value="/Files/Sub",
                method=GET)
public String subfiles(org.springframework.ui.ModelMap map,
                             @RequestParam(value="file")
                             Long parentId,
                             @RequestParam(value="privacy")
                             String privacy)
        Handler method for listing subfiles of the given file.
        Parameters:
        map - The map of UI properties.
        parentId - The ID of the file whose subfiles are to be listed.
        privacy - Value indicating whether the list was opened in 'public' or 'private' subtree.
        Returns:
        File list page.

      • getFileMenu

                method=GET)
public String getFileMenu(org.springframework.ui.ModelMap map,
                                @RequestParam(value="file")
                                Long id)
        Handler method for right click file menu.
        Parameters:
        map - The map of UI properties.
        id - The ID of the file whose menu is to be opened.
        Returns:
        File menu page.

      • createFile

        @RequestMapping(value="/File/Create",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public String createFile(@RequestParam(value="name")
                                            String name,
                                            @RequestParam(value="type")
                                            String type,
                                            @RequestParam(value="parents[]",required=false)
                                            Long[] parents,
                                            @RequestParam(value="blocked",required=false)
                                            Boolean blocked)
        Handler method for creating files.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the file to be created.
        type - The extension of the file to be created.
        parents - List of IDs of the parent files of the created file. Empty if not specified.
        blocked - Value indicating whether the file access to the created file is to be blocked. False by default.
        Returns:
        The file ID of the created file. Error message if creating of the file fails.

      • deleteFile

        @RequestMapping(value="/File/Delete",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public void deleteFile(@RequestParam(value="file")
                                          Long id)
        Handler method for file deleting.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the file to be deleted.

        @RequestMapping(value="/File/Rename",

@ResponseBody
public void renameFile(@RequestParam(value="file")
                                          Long id,
                                          @RequestParam(value="name")
                                          String name)
        Handler method for file renaming.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the file to be renamed.
        name - The new name of the file.

      • downloadFile

        @RequestMapping(value="/File/Download",
                method=GET)
public void downloadFile(@RequestParam(value="file")
                               Long id,
                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Handler method for file downloading.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the file to be downloaded.
        response - The HTTP Response.

      • uploadFile

        @RequestMapping(value="/File/Upload",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public String uploadFile(@RequestParam(value="file")
                                            org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file,
                                            @RequestParam(value="parent",required=false)
                                            Long parent)
        Handler method for file uploading.
        Parameters:
        file - The multipart data containing the uploaded file.
        parent - The ID of the parent of the file to upload.
        Returns:
        ID of the uploaded file. Error message if uploading of the file fails. Limit reached message if the file exceeds the storage capacity.

      • rescueFile

        @RequestMapping(value="/File/Rescue",
                method=GET)
public void rescueFile(@RequestParam(value="file")
                             Long id,
                             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Handler method for emergency downloading of files over the storage space capacity.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the file to be rescued.
        response - The HTML Response.

      • copyFile

        @RequestMapping(value="/File/Copy",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public String copyFile(@RequestParam(value="file")
                                          Long id,
                                          @RequestParam(value="name")
                                          String name)
        Handler method for file copying.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the file the copy.
        name - Name of the copy.
        Returns:
        ID of the new file. Error message if the copying failed. Limit reached message if the new file exceeds the allowed storage space.

      • readFile

        @RequestMapping(value="/File/Read",
                method=GET)
@ResponseBody
public String readFile(@RequestParam(value="file")
                                          Long id)
        Handler method for file reading.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the file to be read.
        Returns:
        File contents. Error message if reading of the file fails.

      • writeFile

        @RequestMapping(value="/File/Write",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public String writeFile(@RequestParam(value="file")
                                           Long id,
                                           @RequestParam(value="data")
                                           String data)
        Handler method for file writing.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the file to be rewritten.
        data - The new file contents.
        Returns:
        The file ID. Error message if the file exceeds the allowed storage space.

      • exceedsAllowedSpace

        public Boolean exceedsAllowedSpace()
        Checks whether the storage space limit is met.
        Returns:
        True if the limit is exceeded. False otherwise.
